```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
train = read.csv('train.csv')
```

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)
library(gridExtra)
library(leaps)
library(psych)
library(NbClust)
library(sqldf)
```

```{r}
hca.fit <- NbClust(data = train[,c('danceability', 'loudness')],
				distance = "euclidean", 
				method = "ward.D",
				index="all")
```
